website_summaries.verdict: The 2019 Razer Blade 15 Advanced Model takes last year's slick, winning design and adds peppy, muscled-up Nvidia GeForce RTX graphics. It's our top recommendation in its class.
pros: Hits well over 60fps while gaming with its RTX 2070 Max-Q GPU
144Hz display benefits from high frame rates

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: All of the pictures advertised in this page show that the secondary keys have back light keys. I received this item today and to my astonishment the item was not as shown the secondary keys are still not back light. Other than that the laptop is fantastic, not much of an upgrade from 1070 model though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible yet disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The productivity and gaming potential of this laptop is incredible, however the fans become incredibly loud under any load even if the device isn’t at all hot (you can manually control the fan speed but I wouldn’t advise it) and the battery under any workload lasts 2 hours which for content creation pretty much means you have to have it plugged into mains the whole time for best productivity outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic to use, but too many issues.
customer_reviews.text: The devices themselves are fantastic, however I've had three now all with issues! 1st one would constantly freeze up when using my 4k monitor. 2nd one would think you'd closed the lid randomly so would turn itself off. Had to disable turning off when the lid closed in power settings but then if I forgot to shut it down first it would get crazy warm in my bag. 3rd one seemed fine but after 2 weeks one of the fans has started to make a lot of noise and is clearly struggling. Going to try and get razer to send me one if it's an easy install but very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Design Packed With Features
customer_reviews.text: Bought my laptop on amazon on the 4th of December 2019, everything came as planned and I'm amazed at the build quality and the premium feel of the laptop. I got the base model and for me, it is more than enough, I travel a lot and the Razer Blade 15 is super lightweight and you are not ashamed of taking it out at the airport. Noise 8/10 Gaming Performance 9/10 Premium Feel 10/10 Recommend it to my friends and family 10/10 The only con I found so far is that fingerprints stay marked everywhere all over the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Vaz

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant (update)
customer_reviews.text: Looks smart. It came with bad backlight bleed of which I had to sort by using a driving license in between the display and bezels, the speakers where very crackly so I had to find new drivers from real tek, they should not have left the factory without being tested in depth... rtx 2060, smart bit off kit I average 198 FPS on cod the battery saver options keep getting stuck on the eco mode which is to do with the razer power plan, I have now sorted that out too. For the money it should come faultless yet it was at a good price at the time off purchase
customer_reviews.author: Frank Charles

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding machine. The Panther of laptops.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, first off, I'm a huge fan of Razer products. The reasons why we're justified with my latest purchase of the Razer Blade 15 base model. The packaging is second to none. Tightly packed and using top quality materials. Nice touch with the screen/keyboard dust cover for wjej you aren't using the machine. The power adapter is slim and feels solid. Nice rubber cable management attached. The laptop itself is quiet even when under load, I play Ark with a fair few mods and this handles the game on epic settings perfectly. Every product I have ever bought from this company really is head and shoulders above its competitors. Keep up the awesome work! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the 4K OLED variant
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4K OLED Touch Screen version and I'm delighted. It's HDR compliant and has Dolby Atmos and 4k films render and play back beautifully. For gaming, the real time race tracing is superb (try it with Metro Exodus). The fans aren't too loud but suggest gaming headphones anyway for complete immersion. Overall, if you can justify the expense (you can) you'll be delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Niall

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop my well be powerful, but, the small form factor generates far too much heat, almost burning my legs. I myself wouldn't recommend this laptop in my honest opinion for gaming, because like I've already said, the form factor is letting this down with very high temperatures on demanding games. Poor venting and being too small is a clear no no for me...I sent it back for a TI tower.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby.

customer_reviews.title: One of the keyboard buttons is loose... Extremely poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and the keyboard felt very weird but I thought maybe it is just me.. Then i saw the B button is very loose at one of the edges.. Extremely bad experience The battery life is poor as well.. I am getting max. two hours with very regular use ... just browsing and watching videos at 60Hz screen option with low brightness Good build quality though.. and extremely good performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Abdollah

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming and university life
customer_reviews.text: Its a great laptop for gaming and university life. The only issue with this laptop is cleaning and taking care of the laptop every 2 months if you love your laptop like me then you won’t have any problems for 10 years at least. This is a very high end laptop And The razer blade Is one of the most popular products by razer. I recommend the rtx2060 since it runs All the new games.
customer_reviews.author: Arshia Keshvari Asl

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop, but very noisy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop to replace my aging one, and I must admit it was worth the upgrade, but there are some pro's and cons. Pros: Great Laptop, works a treat. Graphics are perfect for the games I play (I havent played any very recent games but I imagine it can handle high settings) Cons: Extremely noisy and fans are constantly on for any type of gaming. The battery life gets drained quickly while playing any game. It's very easy to notice smudges on the chassis.
customer_reviews.author: Liam W.

customer_reviews.title: Well built machine but...
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had poor battery life. I went for this laptop because I wanted something that had great built quality and high spec components inside. I'm not a gamer, the machine was primarily going to be used to build software. However, the battery life was woeful so returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secondary function lights are not fixed
customer_reviews.text: The secondary function keyboard are not lit, the laptop is quite heavy, the battery life is about 5:30 hrs for normal surfing, I might replace the unit because I got mine almost fully charged. But all and all, if you are a gamer it is an impressive machine. It doesn't get as hot as I expected, the fan noise is very bearable. The device itself looks really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Waheed

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this laptop especially given the value and hype behind the Razor Brand. Processor has been deliberately under clocked by the manufacturer in the bios and was very restricted to the point that running a benchmark left ridiculously low performance. Graphics card worked well but I sent mine back within 2 days due to the processor restrictions which shouldn't exist on a high end system. Design was brilliant and looked the part but was left very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cool Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought the RTX 2080 version and I don't regret it. I don't really use it like a normal laptop so I can't comment on it's battery life but as a plugged-in portable gaming rig it's awesome. Definitely the best gaming laptop, IMO. One of the few that looks and feels worth the price :)
customer_reviews.author: shanesully

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy this model unless in FULL daylight
customer_reviews.text: Great in so many ways yet unfortunately this laptop needs to NOT be bought. The shift functions do not light up, so any secondary function is not backlit, i thought it would not be an issue but it seriously ruins this laptop. Other models do, have these functions backlit. Please dont buy this you will be massively disappointed, get the backlit keys model. Grahics cards etc etc are all fine. is a very good machine, ruined by this silly lack of lighting, on such an expensive keyboard how much did this save ? I personally wish i could swap it.
customer_reviews.author: peter kramer

customer_reviews.title: Power adapter dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today sooner than expected. Open the box, setup the laptop, everything went fine, until I plugged in the power adapter and it was dead before I'm able to use it. Have to buy a replacement cause I'm travelling soon and can't be arse to contact razer support cause I dealt with them before and know their inability to send me a replacement adapter anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tran Tuan Anh

customer_reviews.title: Razer Blade 15 personal observations
customer_reviews.text: If used daily and extensively, the bottom plate seems to overheat causing it to deform. That leads to pretty noticeable vibrations as the fans come in contact with the plate itself. The laptop itself is amazing for gaming and If you're buying it for that, I can't recommend it enough, however the battery doesn't last too long so you can't use it unwired and the overheating means you will have to take breaks and let the laptop cool down every now and then. Otherwise the performance is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Yuki Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop Terrible Thermals
customer_reviews.text: For working this laptop does it ok however for any intensive tasks like working gaming etc the laptop simply thermal throttles, on idle its around 45c-50c which is a red flag but then temps can reach the 80c-93c while gaming which to me is terrible as this can reduce a lot of the parts lifespan. seriously for anyone reading get a different PC that has better cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Edwards

customer_reviews.title: AC Adapter is very expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, built quality also great. Found a downside, ac adapter expensive to replace. Just to keep in mind. My ac adapter went down recently, after 7 month's of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandrs

customer_reviews.title: Used and not original packaged
customer_reviews.text: This product was not had original packaged,someone used and re-sold,when I read the hard information,it was be used 41hours, I think there maybe issues that I haven't found.
customer_reviews.author: Hao Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Crazy powerful for both work and gaming. Unbelieveable.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely crazy how powerful this is. It exceeds every expectation and works so well with chroma integration with other razer devices. Its astonishing the performance it produced both gaming and word processing for work and University work. Overall the best laptop and computer i have ever had. This replaced by laptop and my desktop and It's the best buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Archer Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: best laptop ever bought feels really premium great gaming performance
customer_reviews.author: haden

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm just surprised how amazing this laptop is, its thin and lightweight, amazing performance and amazing screan.
customer_reviews.author: Linux

customer_reviews.title: Battery died within a year
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is working great, a bit on the loud side. My main issue is that within 9 months the battery bulged and required a replacement. Not really worth the money unless you are often traveling and need to game/code.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gear
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop!! Fingerprints magnet but I can leave with it! Reduce screen refresh rate and battery life is great!
customer_reviews.author: Theodor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, if brought discounted
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful laptop, meets my needs for gaming and general use. With the £450 discount it's actually value for money which is rare in a Razer product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit warm when gaming - but it is a monster
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the RTX card - Ray-traced Quake II ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Voyd_Indigo

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, bad keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I hate the keyboard, and not having backlit secondary function of keys suck. Besides that.. top notch
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Holmelund

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gaming runs everything without any issues after I updated my drivers. Battery life suffers but nothing serious. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ágúst Friðjónsson

customer_reviews.title: Umm the brightness could’ve been higher
customer_reviews.text: It’s one of the best gaming laptops I’ve used and seen to date.

customer_reviews.title: USELESS LAPTOP DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Laptop was broken out of the box. Didn't charge, track pad didn't work and more. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far so good this model can play all the latest games in high or the highest settings.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I used my razer blade for high end gaming and editing on the go and it's amazing!
